text: Tamen [wei xinzhe] shuo:“Jiaru women fanhui mai di na, zui gaogui zhe [abu du la•ben•wu bai ye•ben•sai lu lei, xi mai di na cheng de wei xin toumu] bi ba zui beijian zhe [zhi mu sheng] quzhu chu gai cheng.”[Xuzhi] yiqie rongyao dou shi an la, ta de shizhe [mu sheng] he xinshimen de, dan wei xinzhe bing bu zhidao.
